entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Beaverlodge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:31 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beaverlodge 06:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: -1.8°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow or rain mixed with freezing rain ending this morning then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning then west 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
